goal: Show the core value and test key flows

scenes.title: Landing Page
scenes.narration: Welcome to the Binary Calculator page. You can perform various binary calculations here.

actions.expected_result: The Binary Calculator header is visible.

scenes.title: Performing Binary Calculation
scenes.narration: Let's add two binary numbers. Enter 101 and 110, and click Calculate.

scenes.title: Viewing the Result
scenes.narration: Here is the result of adding the two binary numbers. You can clear the inputs or perform another calculation.

actions.expected_result: Inputs are cleared for a new calculation.

assumptions: The user is interested in binary calculations.
The website is responsive and functional.
risks: Slow loading times might affect user experience.
Unavailability of the website during the demo.
